data.title: Exit (Video Game 2005)
data.meta_description: Exit: Directed by Hiroshi Aoki. With Ryan Drees, Dominic Allen, RuthAnn Morizumi, Max Von Schuler. A puzzle video game in which the player takes the role of professional escapologist Mr. ESC, whose job is to rescue people from dangerous environments such as earthquakes and burning buildings.
